about_the_game:
In a world where every conflict is resolved through games, Ludocracy invites you to step into the shoes of a man who has lost everything to the cruel rules of a game-ruled society. Governed by the divine commandments of the Game God, this world forbids murder and theft, but instead forces its inhabitants to gamble their lives, freedom, and fortunes on the outcome of games.

You must navigate this treacherous world, mastering games like Mancala, Nard, and Tafl to survive and uncover the truth behind your forgotten past. Along the way, you’ll encounter a cast of memorable characters, from cunning gamblers to secretive revolutionaries, each with their own stories and stakes in the game.

But beware—every move you make could mean the difference between freedom and slavery, life and death. Will you rise as a master of games, challenge the very foundations of this world, and rewrite its rules? Or will you become another pawn in the Game God’s eternal play?

Key Features:

  • A Unique Game-Based World: Explore a richly imagined world where games dictate every aspect of life, from personal disputes to the fate of kingdoms.

  • Master Three Classic Games: Learn and master Mancala, Nard, and Tafl through interactive tutorials that teach you the rules, mechanics, and strategies of each game, ensuring you’re ready for any challenge.

  • Skill Trees and Artifice: Develop your skills in Virtuosity (strategy and knowledge) and Artifice (deception and manipulation) to gain an edge in high-stakes matches.

  • Ludic Essence System: Manage your energy as you play, using it to fuel your skills and survive in a world where every game has consequences.

  • Branching Storylines: Make choices that shape Darius’s journey, from seeking revenge to uncovering the truth about the Game God and the world’s origins.

  • Challenging Opponents: Face off against a variety of opponents, each with their own playstyles and motivations, from street gamblers to powerful mob bosses.

  • Moral Dilemmas: Decide whether to uphold the world’s rules, challenge the Game God, or seek a new path entirely.

Ludocracy is a narrative-driven strategy game that blends deep gameplay mechanics with a compelling story of loss, revenge, and redemption. Will you play by the rules, or will you rewrite them? The choice is yours.
